item.title: Herbert Sisk on Patton’s “Tough ‘Ombres”
item.description: WWII veteran Herbert “Bill” Sisk of the 90th Infantry Division shares why General Patton nicknamed his unit the “Tough ‘Ombres” during the Utah Beach invasion.

media:content.media:title: Herbert Sisk on Patton’s “Tough ‘Ombres”
media:content.media:description: WWII veteran Herbert “Bill” Sisk of the 90th Infantry Division shares why General Patton nicknamed his unit the “Tough ‘Ombres” during the Utah Beach invasion.

item.title: Why I Loved the BAR
item.description: A veteran shares personal experiences and insights on the BAR (Browning Automatic Rifle), explaining why it was valued for reliability and impact in combat.

media:content.media:title: Why I Loved the BAR
media:content.media:description: A veteran shares personal experiences and insights on the BAR (Browning Automatic Rifle), explaining why it was valued for reliability and impact in combat.

item.title: He Knew He Could Make It Without Power
item.description: Watch the story of determination and skill as he navigates challenges without relying on power, showcasing ingenuity, resilience, and problem-solving under pressure.

media:content.media:title: He Knew He Could Make It Without Power
media:content.media:description: Watch the story of determination and skill as he navigates challenges without relying on power, showcasing ingenuity, resilience, and problem-solving under pressure.

item.title: A Frontline Story Told by a Veteran
item.description: A veteran shares a firsthand account from the frontlines, offering personal insights into the experiences, challenges, and realities of combat.

media:content.media:title: A Frontline Story Told by a Veteran
media:content.media:description: A veteran shares a firsthand account from the frontlines, offering personal insights into the experiences, challenges, and realities of combat.

item.title: His Final Act Saves the Squadron
item.description: A veteran recounts a heroic story where his decisive final actions protected and saved his squadron, highlighting bravery and selflessness in combat.

media:content.media:title: His Final Act Saves the Squadron
media:content.media:description: A veteran recounts a heroic story where his decisive final actions protected and saved his squadron, highlighting bravery and selflessness in combat.

item.title: John “Jack” Moran: WWII Infantry Veteran
item.description: Follow John “Jack” Moran’s WWII journey from basic training to combat in France and Germany, including Hill 360, the Battle of the Bulge, and the Rhine crossing.

media:content.media:title: John “Jack” Moran: WWII Infantry Veteran
media:content.media:description: Follow John “Jack” Moran’s WWII journey from basic training to combat in France and Germany, including Hill 360, the Battle of the Bulge, and the Rhine crossing.

item.title: Surviving High-Altitude Bombing in WWII
item.description: Explore the extreme challenges faced by airmen during high-altitude bombing missions in WWII, including survival tactics, equipment, and life-threatening conditions.

media:content.media:title: Surviving High-Altitude Bombing in WWII
media:content.media:description: Explore the extreme challenges faced by airmen during high-altitude bombing missions in WWII, including survival tactics, equipment, and life-threatening conditions.

item.title: Oxygen Crisis in the Sky
item.description: Experience a tense situation as an oxygen crisis unfolds in the sky, highlighting the challenges, quick thinking, and critical decisions needed during high-altitude emergencies.

media:content.media:title: Oxygen Crisis in the Sky
media:content.media:description: Experience a tense situation as an oxygen crisis unfolds in the sky, highlighting the challenges, quick thinking, and critical decisions needed during high-altitude emergencies.

item.title: Soldiers Will Die in Combat – Be Prepared
item.description: A sobering look at the realities of combat, emphasizing the importance of preparation, resilience, and understanding the harsh truths soldiers face on the battlefield.

media:content.media:title: Soldiers Will Die in Combat – Be Prepared
media:content.media:description: A sobering look at the realities of combat, emphasizing the importance of preparation, resilience, and understanding the harsh truths soldiers face on the battlefield.

item.title: Rocky Bleier: From Vietnam to Super Bowl Glory
item.description: Rocky Bleier shares his journey from being wounded in Vietnam to winning four Super Bowls with the Pittsburgh Steelers, highlighting resilience, teamwork, and determination.

media:content.media:title: Rocky Bleier: From Vietnam to Super Bowl Glory
media:content.media:description: Rocky Bleier shares his journey from being wounded in Vietnam to winning four Super Bowls with the Pittsburgh Steelers, highlighting resilience, teamwork, and determination.
